document.full_text: one day after deadly tornadoes knocked out power to nuclear reactors in alabama, the head of the u.s. nuclear safety regulator expressed concern whether backup batteries at sites across the united states have the staying power in a prolonged emergency.
document.title: nuclear regulator scrutinizes back-up power plans
lines_and_colors: one day after deadly tornadoes knocked out power to nuclear reactors in alabama, the head of the u.s. nuclear safety regulator expressed concern whether backup batteries at sites across the united states have the staying power in a prolonged emergency.
